name: ManagerLeague
summary:
ManagerLeague is an online Multiplayer Football Manager game enjoyed by thousands of players around the world.
Once in, you take charge of your own club, buy and sell players, train your players to improve in the areas you wish to focus on, send them off on training-camps and much more.
You are also expected to take care of the club economy, signing sponsors and upgrading your stadium and club facilities.
